title: Toxic Spans Detection
description: Character-level toxic span annotation based on SemEval-2021 Task 5 (Pavlopoulos et al., 2021). Instead of binary toxicity classification, annotators identify the specific words/phrases that make a comment toxic, enabling more nuanced content moderation.
